name: Cursed Ruins (DamianLDF)
description:
Created for Godot Wild Jam #54 - Curses

Explore the ruins to find the cursed treasures.

In this version there are 5 treasures, each with different curses. After getting all of them, the game continues with more difficult mazes, but the treasures repeat.

Controls:

Arrows/WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Space to jump

Hold Up+Space or W+Space to climb (must be looking above the wall)

E to open the inventory

Tip: Drop items along the maze to track your path
